canonical_rules.description: Standard criteria for MRI knee without contrast
Exception criteria for MRI knee without contrast
Exclusion criteria for MRI knee without contrast
Special population criteria for MRI knee without contrast

extraction_schema.eligible_diagnosis: ICD-10 diagnosis code(s) supporting medical necessity
extraction_schema.clinical_findings: Clinical findings from physical examination (e.g. positive McMurray's test, joint line tenderness, etc.)
extraction_schema.prior_imaging: Weight-bearing radiographs (X-rays) of the affected knee completed within 60 calendar days prior to the PA request
extraction_schema.conservative_treatment: Type of conservative treatment (e.g. physical therapy, NSAIDs, etc.)
extraction_schema.acute_traumatic_injury: Type of acute traumatic injury (e.g. inability to bear weight, suspected complete rupture of major ligament, etc.)
extraction_schema.post_operative_exception: Post-operative evaluation required within 6 months of knee surgery
extraction_schema.red_flag_exception: Type of red flag exception (e.g. suspected joint infection, suspected primary or metastatic tumor, etc.)
extraction_schema.no_clinical_indication: No clinical indication or symptoms for MRI knee without contrast
extraction_schema.isolated_anterior_knee_pain: Isolated anterior knee pain (patellofemoral syndrome) without mechanical symptoms or instability
extraction_schema.mild_osteoarthritis: Mild osteoarthritis when no surgical planning is intended
extraction_schema.member_declines_surgical_intervention: Member declines surgical intervention regardless of MRI findings
extraction_schema.repeat_mri_within_12_months: Repeat MRI within 12 months without documented change in clinical status, failed intervention, or pre-operative planning requirement
extraction_schema.pediatric_orthopedic_evaluation: Pediatric orthopedic evaluation by a board-certified or board-eligible pediatric orthopedic surgeon
extraction_schema.surgical_candidacy_assessment: Assessment of surgical candidacy for members age 65 and older
extraction_schema.joint_line_tenderness: Joint line tenderness with mechanical symptoms
extraction_schema.persistent_joint_effusion: Persistent joint effusion present for more than 4 weeks
extraction_schema.instability_on_varus_or_valgus_stress_te: Instability on varus or valgus stress testing
extraction_schema.restricted_range_of_motion: Restricted range of motion with a documented mechanical block
extraction_schema.inability_to_bear_weight: Inability to bear weight at the time of evaluation
extraction_schema.suspected_complete_rupture_of_major_liga: Suspected complete rupture of a major ligament (ACL, PCL, MCL, LCL) based on clinical examination
extraction_schema.clinical_findings_consistent_with_displa: Clinical findings consistent with displaced meniscal tear (locked knee) — documented inability to achieve full extension
extraction_schema.suspected_joint_infection: Suspected joint infection (septic arthritis) — fever, elevated inflammatory markers, turbid joint aspirate
extraction_schema.suspected_primary_or_metastatic_tumor: Suspected primary or metastatic tumor of bone or soft tissue
extraction_schema.suspected_occult_fracture: Suspected occult fracture not visualized on X-ray
